text: hi, I have a problem where Julia being too smart causes it to call `LinearAlgebra._generic_matmatmul!`  and `LinearAlgebra.copy_transpose!`  from somewhere in my code. I have some custom types that are derived from `AbstractArray` , so I am pretty sure that this is the cause but I cannot see exactly how that happens. So I would like to know on which typers exactly these get called. What tools could you recommend to figure this out?
